Midas Documentation » SECTION 5: Run Control » Run Control Programs » mhttpd: the MIDAS Web-based Run Control utility

mhttpd Logger page


mlogger settings information

Provided the MIDAS logger mlogger is running, the mhttpd main status page shows logger information and statistics.

mlogger channel information is displayed by clicking on a mlogger channel hyperlink on the mhttpd main status page (see below). The subtree /Logger/Channels/<channel-number>/Settings is shown. See mlogger for more information. In the example below, only one mlogger channel is defined (channel 0). If multiple logging channels are active, additional hyperlinks will be present on the main status page.

mlogger channel information on mhttpd main status page





lazylogger settings information

Provided the MIDAS lazylogger lazylogger is running, the mhttpd main status page shows lazylogger information and statistics.

Lazylogger settings information is displayed by clicking on a lazylogger Label hyperlink on the mhttpd main status page (see above). The subtree /Lazy/<label>/Settings is shown. See lazylogger for more information.
